org.sd.cluster.job
Class JobManager

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.JobManager

public class JobManager
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton to manage all jobs for a ClusterNode.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Detail

JobManager

public JobManager(Config config,
                  ClusterDefinition clusterDefinition,
                  java.lang.String identifier)
Construct a job manager.

Note that there will be one job manager per cluster node. The ClusterNode's NodeServer will pass this jobManager in a ClusterContext to Messages (Jobs) that it handles.

handleJobCommand

public final Response handleJobCommand(Context context,
                                       JobCommand jobCommand,
                                       LocalJobId localJobId,
                                       Publishable payload,
                                       LocalJobId remoteJobId)
Handle the command for the specified local job.

If the local job id is null, send the command to all jobs.

Parameters:
context - the current context.
jobCommand - the job command to handle.
localJobId - the target job for receiving the command. (all jobs if null).
payload - the payload accompanying the command (usually null).
remoteJobId - the (optional) remote job sending the command.
Returns:
the response; usually a BooleanResponse that is true if successful; false if failed.

                       throws java.io.IOException,

Send a job to a running cluster.

Throws:
